title: Bloomberg Markets: Perkin Says `Keep One Eye on Risk'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Perkin Says `Keep One Eye on Risk'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Eddie Perkin Chief Equity Investment Officer Eaton Vance Discussing how investors can get paid for taking risks.
